content: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs Ruff linting, MyPy type checks, and Pytest on every push and pull request across Python 3.11/3.12.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path, PurePosixPath
base=Path("/mnt/data")
list(base.iterdir())[:20]

from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/ci.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: ["**"]
  pull_request:
    branches: ["**"]

permissions:
  contents: read

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.11", "3.12"]

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
          cache: pip

      - name: Install tooling
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          python -m pip install ruff mypy pytest

      - name: Lint (ruff)
        run: |
          ruff check src tests

      - name: Type check (mypy)
        env:
          PYTHONPATH: src
        run: |
          mypy src

      - name: Run tests (pytest)
        env:
          PYTHONPATH: src
        run: |
          pytest -q
"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs Ruff linting, MyPy type checks, and Pytest on every push and pull request across Python 3.11/3.12.
